ManagedServerHowItWorks.title: What you get with Kraken 360 Managed Security & Maintenance

installation_support.title: Installation Support
installation_support.description: We assist with the entire setup, including building nameservers, installing the server according to your specific needs, and configuring SSL, Apache, IIS, and PHP / .NET functions. We also set up additional firewalls, security plugins, and outgoing SMTP filters.

monitoring_maintenance.title: 24/7 Monitoring & Maintenance
monitoring_maintenance.description: We monitor your digital presence 24/7 using our advanced monitoring system, and if an issue arises, we fix it immediately. For example, if the server stops responding on port 80 and your websites go down, our technicians are alerted instantly to troubleshoot and resolve the issue—day or night. In other words, your digital presence is our priority 365 days a year.

software_upgrades.title: Software Upgrades
software_upgrades.description: We take full responsibility for the software delivered with your server, such as cPanel, Plesk, and OS distributions, ensuring that these are always updated to the latest versions as soon as they are released.

support.title: Kraken 360 Support
support.description: You can reach one of our technicians directly at any time via our phone support or website chat. This ensures you skip the standard support queue and speak immediately with an expert if you have any questions or concerns regarding your server, software, or website.
